text: Pauline Wiessner (Polly W. Wiessner) is an American anthropologist currently at University of Utah and, formerly holding a Distinguished Professorship, and is an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science and National Academy of Sciences. == Education == Wiessner earned a Bachelor of Arts from Sarah Lawrence College and a Ph.D. from University of Michigan Ann Arbor. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:American anthropologists Category:University of Michigan alumni
title: Pauline Wiessner
